mapper.select: SELECT count(distinct s.id) FROM ac_sqentityplus s LEFT JOIN base_type t ON t.ssid = s.batypessid LEFT JOIN ac_sqcode a ON a.sqentityssid = s.ssid where 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment}

SELECT s.*, a.id as cid, a.name as cname, a.sqcode as csqcode, a.realpath as crealpath, a.sqentityssid as csqentityssid, a.startTime as cstartTime, a.sqDay as csqDay, a.ssid as cssid, a.string1 as cstring1, a.string2 as cstring2, a.integer1 as cinteger1, a.integer2 as cinteger2 FROM ac_sqentityplus s LEFT JOIN base_type t ON t.ssid = s.batypessid LEFT JOIN ac_sqcode a ON a.sqentityssid = s.ssid where s.id > 0 ${ew.sqlSegment}
SELECT s.*, t.typename sqtypename FROM ac_sqentityplus s LEFT JOIN base_type t ON t.ssid = s.batypessid LEFT JOIN ac_sqcode a ON a.sqentityssid = s.ssid where s.id > 0 ${ew.sqlSegment}

SELECT a.username as name, count(s.id) as sqcount FROM ac_sqentityplus a LEFT JOIN ac_sqcode s ON s.sqentityssid = a.ssid where a.state = 1 and a.id > 0 ${ew.sqlSegment} GROUP BY a.username ORDER BY sqcount desc ,a.startTime desc

SELECT a.companyname as name, count(s.id) as sqcount FROM ac_sqentityplus a LEFT JOIN ac_sqcode s ON s.sqentityssid = a.ssid where a.state = 1 ${ew.sqlSegment} GROUP BY a.companyname ORDER BY sqcount desc

SELECT t.typename as name, count(t.id) as sqcount FROM base_type t LEFT JOIN ac_sqentityplus a on a.batypessid = t.ssid LEFT JOIN ac_sqcode s ON s.sqentityssid = a.ssid where a.state = 1 ${ew.sqlSegment} GROUP BY t.typename
